name: I believe ya, but my robot don't!
name_original: I believe ya, but my robot don't!
description:
A very short little border game made for wowie jam 4.0 in under 72 hours

In this game, you manage a border of an unnamed country, which uses bots for security. You edit the bot's AI every day to make it either accept, reject, or kill crossers. There is no real win or lose condition, just 4 different endings that you can get depending on what you make the AI do.

All art and code were made by me, and the audio was made using SFXR.
